home.title: San Francisco Bay Area Appraisal Association
home.description: Dedicated to promoting professional appraisal standards and serving the Bay Area community

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Currently in Preparation - Launching 2025
about.missionText: To promote professional appraisal standards and provide expert authentication services for antiques, art, and collectibles in the San Francisco Bay Area through education, community outreach, and professional collaboration.
about.visionText: To be the leading voice for professional appraisers in the Bay Area, fostering excellence in authentication and expanding access to reliable appraisal services.
about.value1Text: Maintaining the highest standards of appraisal ethics and authenticity verification.
about.value2Text: Providing accessible and trustworthy appraisal services to diverse communities.
about.value3Text: Supporting continuous learning and growth for appraisal professionals.
about.historyText: Currently in our preparation stage, we are bringing together experienced appraisers and authentication experts to build a strong professional community. Our association is being formed to serve the diverse Bay Area community and will officially launch in 2025.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Appraisal and Authentication Services
services.antiquesDesc: Expert evaluation and authentication of antique furniture, ceramics, and collectibles.
services.artworksDesc: Professional appraisal of paintings, sculptures, and contemporary art pieces.
services.jewelryDesc: Detailed assessment of precious stones, jewelry, and luxury timepieces.
services.calligraphyDesc: Specialized authentication of Chinese calligraphy, paintings, and scrolls.
services.porcelainDesc: Expert evaluation of Chinese and international porcelain and pottery.
services.consultationDesc: Professional advice on building, maintaining, and preserving collections.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent and Competitive Appraisal Fees
pricing.consultationDesc: 30-minute consultation to discuss your items and appraisal needs.
pricing.singleItemDesc: Complete appraisal report for one item, including research and documentation.
pricing.multipleItemsDesc: Discounted rates for multiple items in one session.
pricing.collectionDesc: Comprehensive evaluation of entire collections (10+ items).
pricing.specializedDesc: In-depth authentication for rare antiques, fine art, or high-value items.
pricing.insuranceDesc: Detailed written appraisal reports for insurance purposes.
pricing.noteText: Prices vary based on item complexity, required research, and market value. All appraisals include professional authentication, detailed documentation, and expert consultation.

members.title: Our Members
members.subtitle: Certified Professional Appraisers
members.intro: Our association proudly represents experienced appraisers and authentication experts across the Bay Area.
members.benefit1Desc: Connect with fellow appraisers and share expertise.
members.benefit2Desc: Access to workshops, seminars, and training programs.
members.benefit3Desc: Representation in appraisal standards and community outreach.
members.benefit4Desc: Access to authentication resources and professional guidelines.
members.joinUsText: Become part of the premier appraisal professional community in the Bay Area.

news.title: News & Events
news.subtitle: Stay Updated with Our Latest Activities
news.noEvents: No upcoming events at this time. Check back soon!
